name: Zoo: After hours
description:
Zoo: After hours is a game about a "normal" zoo. Find a hiding spot at the zoo, Survive 24 hours. Easy... right?

Controls:

WASD to move

E to pick up

F to use your flashlight

Shift to sprint

Credits:

Tim Slager

Bram Lamain

Samuel Hietaoja

Kennajana

Install introductions:

Coming Soon

The game was made for International College Jam #1
